name: Crimson Resort and Spa Mactan
description: A luxury beachfront resort offering top-notch spa services, located in Mactan Island.
reviews: Amazing place with breathtaking views! Highly recommended.
The service was top-notch, and the amenities were excellent.
A bit pricey, but worth every penny for a luxury stay.

name: Maayo Hotel
description: A wellness hotel that promotes healthy living, located in Mandaue City.
reviews: The wellness amenities were fantastic and the staff was very attentive.
Great place for a health-focused retreat. The yoga classes were superb.
A bit far from the city center, but worth the stay for its health benefits.

name: Alegria Waterfalls & Mountain Resort
description: A peaceful resort surrounded by nature, perfect for adventure seekers, located in Alegria.
reviews: Fantastic place for nature lovers. The waterfalls view is stunning.
Great adventure activities, but the paths can be a bit rough.
A serene escape with beautiful surroundings. Highly recommended.

name: Summit Galleria Cebu
description: A trendy hotel connected to a shopping mall, offering comfort and convenience, located in Cebu City.
reviews: Perfect for a city stay. The mall access was a great bonus.
Comfortable rooms and excellent location.
The rooftop bar offers great views and a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Argao Royal Palms Serviced Villas
description: Luxury serviced villas with beachfront views, located in Argao.
reviews: The private pool and beachfront view were amazing.
Excellent service and beautiful villas.
A bit secluded but worth it for the tranquility.

name: Plantation Bay Resort and Spa
description: A unique resort featuring man-made lagoons, offering a blend of relaxation and activities, located in Lapu-Lapu City.
reviews: The lagoons are incredible and the water sports are fun.
A great place for both relaxation and activities.
The dining options were fantastic, with plenty of variety.

name: Bantayan Island Nature Park & Resort
description: A nature-focused resort offering tranquility and beautiful views, located in Bantayan Island.
reviews: A serene place with beautiful natural surroundings.
The eco-friendly approach was refreshing and the tours were informative.
Paradise Beach is stunning and a must-visit while staying here.

name: Bluewater Sumilon Island Resort
description: A luxury resort on Sumilon Island, offering breathtaking views and world-class amenities.
reviews: Paradise on earth! The island is stunning.
Perfect for a peaceful retreat. The infinity pool is spectacular.
A bit remote, but worth the travel for its beauty.

name: Seafari Resort Oslob
description: A clifftop resort with stunning ocean views, offering unique accommodations and water activities.
reviews: Stunning views from the top of the cliff.
Great for snorkeling and whale shark watching.
The stairs can be challenging, but the view is worth it.

name: Ocean Breeze Resort Toledo
description: A beachfront resort offering a quiet getaway with picturesque ocean views, located in Toledo.
reviews: A peaceful retreat with stunning views of the ocean.
Good food and friendly staff.
Perfect for a quiet escape.

name: Estrella Del Mar Toledo
description: A Mediterranean-inspired resort with beachfront views and relaxing ambiance, located in Toledo.
reviews: Charming resort with Mediterranean vibes.
The private beach is a highlight.
Good food and a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Tuburan Eco Park Resort
description: An eco-friendly resort nestled in nature, perfect for outdoor activities, located in Tuburan.
reviews: Great place for nature lovers and adventure seekers.
The eco-friendly approach is commendable.
The campsites are well-maintained.

name: The Tuburan Garden Hotel
description: A garden hotel offering a relaxing stay with modern amenities, located in Tuburan.
reviews: A peaceful and relaxing stay in the heart of Tuburan.
The garden is beautiful and well-kept.
Comfortable rooms with all the necessary amenities.

name: Hagnaya Beach Resort & Restaurant
description: A beachfront resort known for its beautiful white sand and excellent dining, located in Bogo City.
reviews: A beautiful beach resort with friendly staff.
The food is excellent and the beach is clean.
Perfect for a family vacation.

name: Bogo Paradise Resort
description: A relaxing beachfront resort with tropical vibes, located in Bogo City.
reviews: A tropical paradise with a peaceful atmosphere.
The snorkeling experience is fantastic.
Great value for money.

name: Malapascua Exotic Island Dive & Beach Resort
description: A renowned dive resort with beachfront access and dive shop, located in Daanbantayan.
reviews: Perfect for diving enthusiasts.
The dive shop staff are knowledgeable and friendly.
The beachfront view is breathtaking.

name: Kandaya Resort
description: A luxury beachfront resort offering world-class amenities and stunning views, located in Daanbantayan.
reviews: A luxurious stay with beautiful surroundings.
The private beach is pristine.
Excellent service and facilities.
